verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H561>words,<s%> and lay <S%H6845>up<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H2421>live;<s%> and my <S%H8451>law<s%> as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eye.<s%>
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H676>fingers,<s%> <S%H3789>write<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3871>table<s%> of thine <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> art my <S%H269>sister;<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> thy kinswoman: <S%H4129><s%>

That they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee from the <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H4480>woman,<s%> <S%H802><s%> from the <S%H4480>stranger<s%> <S%H5237><s%> which <S%H2505>flattereth<s%> with her <S%H561>words.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> at the <S%H2474>window<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> I <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> my <S%H822>casement,<s%>
And <S%H7200>beheld<s%> among the simple <S%H6612>ones,<s%> I <S%H995>discerned<s%> among the <S%H1121>youths,<s%> a young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding,<s%>
Passing <S%H5674><s%> through the <S%H7784>street<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> her <S%H6438>corner;<s%> and he <S%H6805>went<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to her <S%H1004>house,<s%>
In the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> in the <S%H380>black<s%> and <S%H653>dark<s%> night: <S%H3915><s%>
And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H7125>met<s%> him a <S%H802>woman<s%> with the <S%H7897>attire<s%> of a <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> and <S%H5341>subtle<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
(She <S%H1931><s%> is <S%H1993>loud<s%> and <S%H5637>stubborn;<s%> her <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7931>abide<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in her house: <S%H1004><s%>
Now <S%H6471><s%> is she <S%H2351>without,<s%> <S%H6471>now<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets,<s%> and lieth in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H681>at<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6438>corner.)<s%>
So she <S%H2388>caught<s%> him, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him, and with an <S%H5810>impudent<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him,
I have peace <S%H2077>offerings<s%> <S%H8002><s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> me; this <S%H3117>day<s%> have I <S%H7999>paid<s%> my <S%H5088>vows.<s%>
Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> came I <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thee, diligently to <S%H7836>seek<s%> thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> and I have <S%H4672>found<s%> thee.
I have <S%H7234>decked<s%> my <S%H6210>bed<s%> with coverings of <S%H4765>tapestry,<s%> with <S%H2405>carved<s%> works, with fine <S%H330>linen<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
I have <S%H5130>perfumed<s%> my <S%H4904>bed<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> <S%H174>aloes,<s%> and <S%H7076>cinnamon.<s%>
Come, <S%H1980><s%> let us take our <S%H7301>fill<s%> of <S%H1730>love<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> let us solace <S%H5965>ourselves<s%> with <S%H159>loves.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H376>goodman<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> at <S%H1004>home,<s%> he is <S%H1980>gone<s%> a <S%H4480>long<s%> <S%H7350><s%> journey: <S%H1870><s%>
He hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H6872>bag<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H3027>with<s%> him, and will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> at the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3677>appointed.<s%>
With her <S%H7230>much<s%> fair <S%H3948>speech<s%> she caused him to <S%H5186>yield,<s%> with the <S%H2506>flattering<s%> of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> she <S%H5080>forced<s%> him.

He <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her <S%H6597>straightway,<s%> as an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H935>goeth<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> or as a <S%H191>fool<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4148>correction<s%> of the <S%H5914>stocks;<s%>

Till <S%H5704><s%> a <S%H2671>dart<s%> strike <S%H6398>through<s%> his <S%H3516>liver;<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H4116>hasteth<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6341>snare,<s%> and <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is for his <S%H5315>life.<s%>
Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, O ye <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H7181>attend<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Let <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7847>decline<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her <S%H1870>ways,<s%> go not <S%H8582>astray<s%> <S%H408><s%> in her <S%H5410>paths.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> she hath cast <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2491>wounded:<s%> yea, <S%H3605>many<s%> <S%H6099>strong<s%> men have been <S%H2026>slain<s%> by her.
Her <S%H1004>house<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7585>hell,<s%> going <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
